anya-e0805n2:2: Tattha ekampi atthaṁ kammādivasena, ekattādivasena ca vibhajantīti vibhattiyo, syādayo. Tā pana paṭhamādibhedena sattavidhā.
anya-e0805n2:6_0: Liṅgassa attho liṅgattho. Ettha ca līnaṁ aṅganti liṅgaṁ, apākaṭo avayavo, purisotiādīnañhi
anya-e0805n2:6_2: paṭhamaṁ ṭhapetabbaṁ pakatirūpaṁ apākaṭattā, avayavattā ca liṅganti vuccati. Atha
anya-e0805n2:6_4: ca līnassa gamanato, liṅganato vā liṅganti anvatthanāmavasena vā ‘‘dhātuppaccayavibhattivajjitamatthavaṁ
anya-e0805n2:6_5: liṅga’’nti vacanato parasamaññāvasena vā liṅganti idha pāṭipadikāparanāmadheyyaṁ
anya-e0805n2:7_0: Liṅgassattho nāma pabandhavisesākārena pavattamāne rūpādayo upādāya paññāpīyamāno
anya-e0805n2:8_0: So pana kammādisaṁsaṭṭho, suddho cāti duvidho. Tattha kammādīsu dutiyādīnaṁ vidhīyamānattā
anya-e0805n2:8_2: ca suddho saddattho idha liṅgattho nāma.
anya-e0805n2:9_0: Yo pana ākhyātakitakataddhitasamāsehi vutto kammādisaṁsaṭṭho attho, sopi dutiyādīnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:9_1: puna attanā vattabbassa atthavisesassābhāvena avisayattā, liṅgatthamattassa sambhavato
anya-e0805n2:13: Saliṅge tāva – eso puriso, ete purisā, esā kaññā, etā kaññāyo, etaṁ cittaṁ, etāni cittāni.
anya-e0805n2:16: Liṅgādivinimutte sattāmatte – ca vā ha ahaṁ atthi sakkālabbhā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:17: ‘‘Liṅgatthe paṭhamā’’ti adhikicca ‘‘ālapane cā’’ti ālapanatthe ca paṭhamā, abhimukhaṁ katvā lapanaṁ ālapanaṁ, āmantanaṁ avhānanti attho.
anya-e0805n2:18_0: Ettha ca āmantanaṁ nāma pageva laddhasarūpassa saddena abhimukhīkaraṇaṁ, katābhimukho
anya-e0805n2:18_1: pana ‘‘gacchā’’tiādinā nayena kriyāya yojīyati, tasmā āmantanasamaye kriyāyogābhāvato
anya-e0805n2:22: Bho purisa ehi, bho purisā vā, bhavanto purisā etha.
anya-e0805n2:26: Anabhihite evāyaṁ, ‘‘kammani dutiyāyaṁ tto’’ti vacanañcettha ñāpakaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:28: ‘‘Yena vā kayirate taṁ karaṇa’’nti ito ‘‘vā’’ti vattate.
anya-e0805n2:30: Yaṁ vā karoti, yaṁ vā vikaroti, yaṁ vā pāpuṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ kammasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:31_0: Idha liṅgakālavacanamatantaṁ. Karīyatīti kammaṁ. Tattha kārakaṁ, sādhakaṁ kriyānipphattiyā
anya-e0805n2:31_1: kāraṇamuccate, taṁ pana kārakaṁ chabbidhaṁ kammaṁ kattā karaṇaṁ sampadānamapādānamokāso
anya-e0805n2:31_2: cāti. Tattha sabhāvato, parikappato vā kammādimhi satiyeva kriyābhāvato kammādīnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:32_0: Taṁ pana kammaṁ tividhaṁ nibbattanīyaṁ vikaraṇīyaṁ pāpaṇīyañcāti. Yathā – mātā puttaṁ
anya-e0805n2:32_1: vijāyati, āhāro sukhaṁ janayati. Ghaṭaṁ karoti devadatto, kaṭṭhamaṅgāraṁ karoti,
anya-e0805n2:32_2: suvaṇṇaṁ keyūraṁ, kaṭakaṁ vā karoti, vīhayo lunāti. Devadatto nivesanaṁ pavisati,
anya-e0805n2:32_3: ādiccaṁ passati, dhammaṁ suṇāti, paṇḍite payirupāsati.
anya-e0805n2:36_1: karoti taṁ kamma’’nti vuttattā, atthantaravikappanavādhikārato ca sabbattha imināva kammasaññā hoti.
anya-e0805n2:37: Tattha anicchitakammaṁ yathā – kaṇṭakaṁ maddati, visaṁ gilati, gāmaṁ gacchanto rukkhamūlaṁ upagacchati.
anya-e0805n2:38_0: Akathitakammaṁ yathā – yaññadattaṁ kambalaṁ yācate brāhmaṇo. Ettha hi ‘‘kambala’’miti
anya-e0805n2:38_2: appadhānattā akathitakammaṁ. Tathā samiddhaṁ dhanaṁ bhikkhate, ajaṁ gāmaṁ nayati,
anya-e0805n2:38_3: parābhavantaṁ purisaṁ, mayaṁ pucchāma gotamaṁ, bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:39: Abhihitakamme pana na hoti, yathā – kaṭo karīyate devadattena, sugatena desito dhammo, yaññadatto kambalaṁ yācīyate brāhmaṇena iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:41: 286.Gati buddhi bhuja paṭha hara kara sayādīnaṁ kārite vā.
anya-e0805n2:42_0: Gamu sappa gatimhi, budha bodhane, budha avagamane vā, bhuja pālanabyavaharaṇesu,
anya-e0805n2:42_1: paṭha byattiyaṁ vācāyaṁ, hara haraṇe, kara karaṇe, si saye iccevamādīnaṁ dhātūnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:42_2: payoge kārite sati payojjakakattubhūte kammani liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti vā. Niccasampatte
anya-e0805n2:42_3: vikappatthoyaṁ, tena tassa pakkhe tatiyā hoti.
anya-e0805n2:43_0: Yo koci puriso gāmaṁ gacchati, tamañño payojayati. Puriso purisaṁ gāmaṁ gamayati,
anya-e0805n2:43_1: purisena vā gāmaṁ gamayati. Evaṁ sissaṁ dhammaṁ bodheti ācariyo, mātā puttaṁ bhojanaṁ
anya-e0805n2:43_2: bhojayati, sissaṁ dhammaṁ pāṭheti ācariyo, puriso purisaṁ bhāraṁ hāreti, tathā puriso
anya-e0805n2:43_3: purisaṁ kammaṁ kārayati, purisena vā kammaṁ kārāpayati, puriso purisaṁ sayāpayati.
anya-e0805n2:45: Abhihite na bhavati, purisena puriso gāmaṁ gamīyate, sisso dhammaṁ bodhīyate iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:47: Accantaṁ nirantaraṁ saṁyogoaccantasaṁyogo. Kāladdhānaṁ dabbaguṇakriyāhi accantasaṁyoge tehi kāladdhānavācīhi liṅgehi dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:48: Kāle tāva – sattāhaṁ gavapānaṁ, māsaṁ maṁsodanaṁ, saradaṁ ramaṇīyā nadī, sabbakālaṁ ramaṇīyaṁ nandanaṁ, māsaṁ sajjhāyati, tayo māse abhidhammaṁ desesi.
anya-e0805n2:49: Addhāne – yojanaṁ vanarāji, yojanaṁ dīgho pabbato, kosaṁ sajjhāyati.
anya-e0805n2:50: Accantasaṁyogeti kiṁ? Māse māse bhuñjati, yojane yojane vihāraṁ patiṭṭhāpesi.
anya-e0805n2:52: Kammappavacanīyehi nipātopasaggehi yutte yoge sati liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:53: Kammaṁ pavacanīyaṁ yesaṁ te kammappavacanīyā, parasamaññāvasena vā anvādayo kammappavacanīyā.
anya-e0805n2:54_0: Tattha anusaddassa lakkhaṇe, sahatthe, hīne ca kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Yathā
anya-e0805n2:54_1: – pabbajitamanu pabbajiṁsu, nadimanvavasitā bārāṇasī, nadiyā saha avabaddhāti attho,
anya-e0805n2:55: Lakkhaṇādīsu ‘‘lakkhaṇi’tthambhūtakkhānabhāga vicchāsu pati pari anavo’’ti pati pari anūnaṁ kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā.
anya-e0805n2:56: Lakkhaṇe sūriyuggamanaṁ pati dibbā bhakkhā pātubhaveyyuṁ, rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṁ pari, rukkhaṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:57: Itthambhūtakkhāne sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ pati, mātaraṁ pari, mātaraṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:58: Bhāge yadettha maṁ pati siyā, maṁ pari, maṁ anu, taṁ dīyatu.
anya-e0805n2:59: Vicchāyoge atthamatthaṁ pati saddo nivisati, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pati vijjotate cando, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ pari, rukkhaṁ rukkhaṁ anu.
anya-e0805n2:60: ‘‘Abhirabhāge’’ti abhissa bhāgavajjitesu lakkhaṇādīsu kammappavacanīyasaññā vuttā. Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato, sādhu devadatto mātaraṁ abhi.
anya-e0805n2:63_0: Chaṭṭhīnaṁ atthe kvaci dutiyāvibhatti hoti. Antarāabhito parito pati paṭibhātiyoge
anya-e0805n2:63_1: ayaṁ. Antarā ca rājagahaṁ antarā ca nāḷandaṁ addhānamaggappaṭipanno, rājagahassa
anya-e0805n2:63_2: ca nāḷandāya ca majjheti attho. Abhito gāmaṁ vasati, parito gāmaṁ vasati, nadiṁ nerañjaraṁ
anya-e0805n2:63_3: pati, nerañjarāya nadiyā samīpeti attho. Paṭibhantu taṁ cunda bojjhaṅgā, upamā maṁ
anya-e0805n2:66: Tatiyāsattamīnamatthe ca kvaci liṅgamhā dutiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:67: Tatiyatthe sace maṁ nālapissati, tvañca maṁ nābhibhāsasi, vinā saddhammaṁ kuto sukhaṁ, upāyamantarena na atthasiddhi.
anya-e0805n2:68: Sattamiyatthe– kāle, upānvajjhāvasassa payoge, adhisiṭṭhāvasānaṁ payoge, tappānacāre ca dutiyā.
anya-e0805n2:69: Kāle tāva – pubbaṇhasamayaṁ nivāsetvā, ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā. Imaṁ rattiṁ cattāro mahārājāno.
anya-e0805n2:70_0: Upādipubbassa vasadhātussa payoge – gāmaṁ upavasati, gāmaṁ anuvasati, vihāraṁ adhivasati,
anya-e0805n2:70_1: gāmaṁ āvasati, agāraṁ ajjhāvasati. Tathā pathaviṁ adhisessati, gāmaṁ adhitiṭṭhati, gāmaṁ ajjhāvasati.
anya-e0805n2:71: Tappānacāresu – nadiṁ pivati, gāmaṁ carati iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:77: Yena vā kattā upakaraṇabhūtena vatthunā kriyaṁ abyavadhānena karoti, yena vā vikaroti, yena vā pāpuṇāti, taṁ kārakaṁ karaṇasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:78: Karīyate anenāti karaṇaṁ, ettha ca satipi sabbakārakānaṁ kriyāsādhakatte ‘‘yena vā kayirate’’ti visesetvā vacanaṁ kattūpakaraṇabhūtesu kārakesu sādhakatamasseva gahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:81: Sambhāvīyati taṁ vuttaṁ, karaṇaṁ nāma kāraka’’nti.
anya-e0805n2:83: Yathā – hatthena kammaṁ karoti, cakkhunā rūpaṁ passati, manasā dhammaṁ viññāya. Dattena vīhayo lunāti, agginā kuṭiṁ jhāpeti.
anya-e0805n2:86_0: Kattari ca kārake liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Caggahaṇena itthambhūtalakkhaṇe,
anya-e0805n2:86_1: kriyāpavagge, pubbasadisasamūnattha kalaha nipuṇa missaka sakhilatthādiyoge, kāladdhānesu,
anya-e0805n2:89: Yo kriyaṁ attappadhāno hutvā karoti, so kattusañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:90_0: So tividho suddhakattā hetukattā kammakattāti. Tattha yo sayameva kriyaṁ karoti,
anya-e0805n2:90_1: so suddhakattā. Yo aññaṁ kātuṁ samatthaṁ akarontaṁ kammaṁ niyojeti, so hetukattā,
anya-e0805n2:90_2: yathā – gantuṁ samattho devadatto, tamañño payojeti ‘‘gamayati devadatta’’nti.
anya-e0805n2:91_0: Yaṁ pana tattha tattha gacchati devadatto, tamañño payojayati ‘‘gamayati devadatta’’nti
anya-e0805n2:91_1: hetvatthanidassanaṁ, tampi sāmatthiyadassanavasena vuttanti gahetabbaṁ. Aññathā yadi
anya-e0805n2:91_2: sayameva gacchati, kiṁ tattha payojakabyāpārena akarontaṁ balena kārayati, pāsāṇaṁ
anya-e0805n2:95: Yo kattāraṁ kāreti, so hetusañño hoti, kattā cāti hetukattusaññā.
anya-e0805n2:96: Yo pana parassa kriyaṁ paṭicca kammabhūtopi sukarattā sayameva sijjhanto viya hoti, so kammakattā nāma, yathā – sayaṁ karīyate kaṭo, sayameva paccate odanoti.
anya-e0805n2:99: Appayutto payutto vā, sa kattāti pavuccati.
anya-e0805n2:104_0: Nanu ca ‘‘saṁyogo jāyate’’tiādīsu kathaṁ pure asato jananakriyāya kattubhāvosiyāti?
anya-e0805n2:104_1: Vuccate – lokasaṅketasiddho hi saddappayogo, avijjamānampi hi loko saddābhidheyyatāya
anya-e0805n2:104_2: vijjamānaṁ viya gahetvā voharati , vikappabuddhigahitākāroyeva hi saddenābhidhīyate,
anya-e0805n2:104_3: na tu vatthusabhāvo, aññathā sutamayañāṇenapi paccakkhena viya vatthusabhāvasacchikaraṇappasaṅgo
anya-e0805n2:104_4: ca musāvāda kudiṭṭhivādādīnamabhāvappasaṅgo ca siyā, tasmā buddhiparikappitapaññattivasenapi
anya-e0805n2:104_5: saddappavatti hotīti asato saṁyogādissapi hoteva jananakriyāya kattukārakatāti.
anya-e0805n2:108: Buddhiyā gahitattā hi, saṁyogo jāyate iti;
anya-e0805n2:110: Tatra tatiyā jinena desito dhammo, buddhena jito māro, ahinā daṭṭho naro, buddhena bodhito loko, saddhehi kārito vihāro.
anya-e0805n2:111: Abhihite na bhavati. Kaṭaṁ karoti devadatto, kāreti vā.
anya-e0805n2:112_0: Itthambhūtassa lakkhaṇe – sā bhinnena sīsena paggharantena lohitena paṭivissakānaṁ
anya-e0805n2:112_1: ujjhāpesi, ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṁ navaṁ pattaṁ cetāpeyya, tidaṇḍakena paribbājakamaddakkhi.
anya-e0805n2:113: Apavagge – ekāheneva bārāṇasiṁ pāyāsi, navahi māsehi vihāraṁ niṭṭhāpesi, yojanena adhītaṁ byākaraṇaṁ, kriyāpavaggoti kriyāya āsuṁ pariniṭṭhāpanaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:114_0: Pubbādiyoge– māsena pubbo, pitarā sadiso, mātarā samo, kahāpaṇena ūno, dhanena vikalo,
anya-e0805n2:114_1: asinā kalaho, ācārena nipuṇo, vācāya nipuṇo, guḷena missakaṁ, tilena missakaṁ, vācāya
anya-e0805n2:114_2: sakhilo, maṇinā attho, dhanena attho, pitarā tulyo.
anya-e0805n2:120: Saha saddhiṁ samaṁ nānā vinā alaṁ kimiccevamādīhi yoge liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena sahatthepi.
anya-e0805n2:121_0: Tattha sahasaddena yogo kriyā guṇa dabba samavāye sambhavati. Yathā – vitakkena saha
anya-e0805n2:121_1: vattati, puttena saha thūlo, antevāsikasaddhivihārikehi saha ācariyupajjhāyānaṁ lābho,
anya-e0805n2:121_2: nisīdi bhagavā saddhiṁ bhikkhusaṅghena, sahassena samaṁ mitā, sabbehi me piyehi manāpehi
anya-e0805n2:121_3: nānābhāvo vinābhāvo, saṅgho vināpi gaggena uposathaṁ kareyya, alaṁ te idha vāsena,
anya-e0805n2:121_4: kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇena, purisena thāmadassinā, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṁ te ajinasāṭiyā.
anya-e0805n2:122: Sahatthe– devadatto rājagahaṁ pāvisi kokālikena pacchāsamaṇena, dukkho bālehi saṁvāso.
anya-e0805n2:124: Yogaggahaṇamihānuvattate, hetvatthe, hetvatthappayoge ca liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:125: Kismiñci phale diṭṭhasāmatthiyaṁ kāraṇaṁ hetu, soyeva attho, tasmiṁ hetvatthe, annena vasati, dhammena vasati, vijjāya vasati.
anya-e0805n2:131: Kena pāṇi kāmadado, kena pāṇi madhussavo;
anya-e0805n2:132: Kena te brahmacariyena, puññaṁ pāṇimhi ijjhati.
anya-e0805n2:133: Hetvatthappayoge – kena nimittena, kena payojanena, kenaṭṭhena, kena hetunā vasati.
anya-e0805n2:136_0: Kāladdhānadisādesādīsu cāyaṁ. Tena samayena, tena kālena, kālena dhammassavaṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:136_1: so vo mamaccayena satthā, māsena bhuñjati, yojanena dhāvati. Puratthimena dhataraṭṭho,
anya-e0805n2:136_2: dakkhiṇena virūḷhako, pacchimena virūpakkho, uttarena kasivanto janoghamaparena ca,
anya-e0805n2:138: Yena byādhimatā aṅgena aṅgino vikāro lakkhīyate, tattha tatiyāvibhatti hoti. Ettha ca aṅgamassa atthīti aṅgaṁ, sarīraṁ. Akkhinā kāṇo, hatthena kuṇī, pādena khañjo, piṭṭhiyā khujjo.
anya-e0805n2:140: Visesīyati visesitabbaṁ anenāti visesanaṁ, gottādi. Tasmiṁ gottanāmajātisippavayoguṇasaṅkhāte visesanatthe tatiyāvibhatti hoti, casaddena pakatiādīhi ca. Gottena gotamo nātho.
anya-e0805n2:141: Sāriputtoti nāmena, vissuto paññavā ca so;
anya-e0805n2:145: Sippena naḷakāro so, ekūnatiṁso vayasā, vijjāya sādhu, paññāya sādhu, tapasā uttamo, suvaṇṇena abhirūpo.
anya-e0805n2:146: Pakatiādīsu – pakatiyā abhirūpo, yebhuyyena mattikā, samena dhāvati, visamena dhāvati, dvidoṇena dhaññaṁ kiṇāti, sahassena assake kiṇāti iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:151: 302.Yassa dātukāmo rocate dhārayate vā taṁ sampadānaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:152: Yassa vā dātukāmo, yassa vā rocate, yassa vā dhārayate, taṁ kārakaṁ sampadānasaññaṁ hoti. Sammā padīyate assāti sampadānaṁ, paṭiggāhako.
anya-e0805n2:153_0: Taṁ pana tividhaṁ diyyamānassānivāraṇajjhesanānumativasena. Yathā – buddhassa pupphaṁ
anya-e0805n2:153_1: yajati, bodhirukkhassa jalaṁ dadāti. Ajjhesane – yācakānaṁ dhanaṁ dadāti. Anumatiyaṁ
anya-e0805n2:156: Sampadānaṁ tidhā vuttaṁ, rukkha yācaka bhikkhavo’’ti.
anya-e0805n2:158: Rocanādīsu pana – samaṇassa rocate saccaṁ, māyasmantānampi saṅghabhedo ruccittha, yassāyasmato khamati, devadattassa suvaṇṇacchattaṁ dhārayate yaññadatto.
anya-e0805n2:160_0: 303.Silāgha hanu ṭhā sapa dhāra piha kudha duhi ssāsūya rādhikkha paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇapubbakattārocanatthatadattha
anya-e0805n2:160_1: tumatthālamattha maññānādarappāṇini gatyatthakammani āsisattha sammuti bhiyyasattamyatthesu ca.
anya-e0805n2:161_0: Catuppadamidaṁ . Silāgha katthane, hanu apanayane, ṭhā gatinivattimhi, sapa akkose,
anya-e0805n2:161_1: dhara dhāraṇe, piha icchāyaṁ iccetesaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge, kudha kope, duha jighaṁsāyaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:161_2: issa issāyaṁ, usūya dosāvikaraṇe iccetesaṁ tadatthavācīnañca dhātūnaṁ payoge ca rādha
anya-e0805n2:161_3: hiṁsāsaṁrādhesu, ikkha dassanaṅkesūti imesaṁ payoge ca pati āpubbassa su savaṇeti
anya-e0805n2:161_4: imassa ca anupatipubbassa gesaddeti imassa ca pubbakattā ca ārocanatthappayoge, tadatthe,
anya-e0805n2:161_5: tumatthe, alamatthappayoge ca maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini ca gatyatthānaṁ kammani
anya-e0805n2:161_6: ca āsisatthappayoge ca sammuti bhiyyappayogesu ca sattamyatthe cāti taṁ kammādikārakaṁ
anya-e0805n2:161_7: sampadānasaññaṁ hoti, casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇatikappati pahoti upamāñjalikaraṇa phāsu
anya-e0805n2:162: Silāghādippayoge tāva – buddhassa silāghate. Upajjhāyassa silāghate, thometīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:163: Hanute mayhameva, hanute tuyhameva, apalapatīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:164: Upatiṭṭheyya sakyaputtānaṁ vaḍḍhakī, ettha ca upaṭṭhānaṁ nāma upagamanaṁ. Bhikkhussa bhuñjamānassa pānīyena vā vidhūpanena vā upatiṭṭheyya.
anya-e0805n2:165: Tuyhaṁ sapate, mayhaṁ sapate, ettha ca sapanaṁ nāma saccakaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:166: Dhārayatippayoge dhanikoyeva sampadānaṁ, suvaṇṇaṁ te dhārayate, iṇaṁ dhārayatīti attho. Tassa rañño mayaṁ nāgaṁ dhārayāma.
anya-e0805n2:167: Pihappayoge icchitoyeva, devāpi tassa pihayanti tādino, devāpi tesaṁ pihayanti, sambuddhānaṁ satīmataṁ, patthentīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:168: Kodhādiatthānaṁ payoge yaṁ pati kopo, tassa kujjha mahāvīra, yadihaṁ tassa kuppeyyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:169: Duhayati disānaṁ megho, yo mittānaṁ na dubbhati.
anya-e0805n2:171: Dujjanā guṇavantānaṁ usūyanti, kā usūyā vijānataṁ.
anya-e0805n2:172_0: Rādhikkhappayoge yassa vipucchanaṁ kammavikhyāpanatthaṁ, vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Ārādho
anya-e0805n2:172_1: me rañño, rañño aparajjhati, rājānaṁ vā aparajjhati, kyāhaṁ ayyānaṁ aparajjhāmi,
anya-e0805n2:173: Āyasmato upālittherassa upasampadāpekkho upatisso, āyasmantaṁ vā.
anya-e0805n2:174_0: Paccāsuṇa anupatigiṇānaṁ pubbakattā ca suṇotissa dhātussa paccāyoge, giṇassa ca anupatiyoge
anya-e0805n2:174_1: pubbassa kammuno yo kattā, so sampadānasañño hoti. Yathā – bhagavā bhikkhū etadavoca,
anya-e0805n2:174_3: kattā bhagavā. Bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ, āsuṇanti buddhassa bhikkhū, tathā bhikkhu
anya-e0805n2:174_4: janaṁ dhammaṁ sāveti, tassa bhikkhuno jano anugiṇāti, tassa bhikkhuno jano patigiṇāti,
anya-e0805n2:175: Yo vadeti sa kattāti, vuttaṁ kammanti vuccati;
anya-e0805n2:177_0: Ārocanatthappayoge yassa āroceti, taṁ sampadānaṁ. Ārocayāmi vo bhikkhave, paṭivedayāmi
anya-e0805n2:177_1: vo bhikkhave, āmantayāmi te mahārāja, āmanta kho taṁ gacchāmāti vā. Ettha ca ārocanasaddassa
anya-e0805n2:177_2: kathanappakāratthattā desanatthādippayogepi catutthī. Dhammaṁ vo desessāmi, desetu
anya-e0805n2:177_3: bhante bhagavā dhammaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ, yathā no bhagavā byākareyya, niruttiṁ te pavakkhāmi iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:181: Akārantato liṅgamhā parassa catutthekavacanassa āyādeso hoti vā, saralopādi.
anya-e0805n2:182_0: Buddhassatthāya dhammassatthāya saṅghassatthāya jīvitaṁ pariccajāmi, piṇḍapātaṁ paṭisevāmi
anya-e0805n2:182_1: neva davāya na madāya na maṇḍanāya na vibhūsanāya, ūnassa pāripūriyā, atthāya hitāya sukhāya saṁvattati.
anya-e0805n2:183: Tumatthe – lokānukampāya, lokamanukampitunti attho. Tathā phāsuvihārāya.
anya-e0805n2:184: Alaṁsaddassa atthā arahapaṭikkhepā. Arahatthe – alaṁ me rajjaṁ, alaṁ bhikkhu pattassa, akkhadhutto purisapuggalo nālaṁ dārabharaṇāya, alaṁ mallo mallassa, arahati mallo mallassa.
anya-e0805n2:185: Paṭikkhepe– alaṁ te idha vāsena, alaṁ me hiraññasuvaṇṇena, kiṁ me ekena tiṇṇena, kiṁ te jaṭāhi dummedha, kiṁ tettha catumaṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n2:186: Maññatippayoge anādare appāṇini kammaniyeva – kaṭṭhassa tuvaṁ maññe, kaḷiṅgarassa tuvaṁ maññe, jīvitaṁ tiṇāyapi na maññamāno.
anya-e0805n2:187: Anādareti kiṁ? Suvaṇṇaṁ taṁ maññe. Appāṇinīti kiṁ? Gadrabhaṁ tuvaṁ maññe.
anya-e0805n2:188: Gatyatthakammani vādhikārato dutiyā ca. Appo saggāya gacchati, appo saggaṁ gacchati, nibbānāya vajantiyā, mūlāya paṭikasseyya, mūlaṁ paṭikasseyya.
anya-e0805n2:189_0: Āsīsanatthe āyubhaddakusalādiyogeyeva, āyasmato dīghāyu hotu, ‘‘totitā sasmiṁnāsū’’ti
anya-e0805n2:189_1: ntussa savibhattissa to ādeso. Bhaddaṁ bhavato hotu, kusalaṁ bhavato hotu, anāmayaṁ
anya-e0805n2:189_2: bhavato hotu, sukhaṁ bhavato hotu, atthaṁ bhavato hotu, hitaṁ bhavato hotu, svāgataṁ
anya-e0805n2:190: Sammutippayoge – sādhu sammuti me tassa bhagavato dassanāya.
anya-e0805n2:192: Sattamiyatthe āvikaraṇa pātubhavanādiyoge – tuyhañcassa āvikaromi, tassa me sakko pāturahosi.
anya-e0805n2:193_0: Casaddaggahaṇena pahiṇādikriyāyoge, phāsuādināmapayoge ca – tassa pahiṇeyya, bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:193_1: dūtaṁ pāhesi, kappati samaṇānaṁ āyogo, ekassa dinnaṁ dvinnaṁ tiṇṇaṁ pahoti, upamaṁ
anya-e0805n2:193_2: te karissāmi, añjaliṁ te paggaṇhāmi. Tathā tassa phāsu hoti, lokassattho, maṇinā
anya-e0805n2:193_3: me attho, seyyo me attho iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:196_0: Namosaddayoge, sotthisvāgatādīhi ca yoge liṅgamhā catutthīvibhatti hoti. Namo te
anya-e0805n2:196_1: buddha vīratthu, namo karohi nāgassa, namatthu buddhānaṁ, namatthu bodhiyā, sotthi
anya-e0805n2:196_2: pajānaṁ, svāgataṁ te mahārāja, atho te adurāgataṁ.
anya-e0805n2:199: Bhāvavācimhi catutthīvibhatti hoti bhavissatikāle. Bhavanaṁ bhāvo. Paccissate, pacanaṁ vā pāko, pākāya vajati, pacituṁ gacchatīti attho. Evaṁ bhogāya vajati iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:204: Yasmā vā avadhito apeti, yasmā vā bhayahetuto bhayaṁ bhavati, yasmā vā akkhātārā vijjaṁ ādadāti, taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti. Apanetvā ito ādadātīti apādānaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:205: Taṁ pana tividhaṁ visayabhedena niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ, upāttavisayaṁ, anumeyyavisayañcāti.
anya-e0805n2:206: Apādānasaññāvisayassa kriyāvisesassa niddiṭṭhattā niddiṭṭhavisayaṁ. Yathā – gāmā apenti munayo, nagarā niggato rājā.
anya-e0805n2:207: Ettha ca ‘‘pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye, pāpā nivārentī’’tiādīsu yadipi kāyasaṁyogapubbakāpagamanaṁ natthi, tathāpi cittasaṁyogapubbakassa apagamanassa sambhavato iminā ca apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n2:208_0: Yattha pana apagamanakriyaṁ upāttaṁ ajjhāhaṭaṁ visayaṁ katvā pavattati, taṁ upāttavisayaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:208_1: Yathā – valāhakā vijjotate vijju, kusūlato pacatīti. Ettha ca ‘‘valāhakā nikkhamma,
anya-e0805n2:209: Anumeyyavisayaṁ yathā – māthurā pāṭaliputtakehi abhirūpā. Ettha hi kenaci guṇena ukkaṁsīyantīti anumeyyova kriyāviseso. Idha pana dūrantikādisutte vibhattaggahaṇena apādānasaññā.
anya-e0805n2:214: Calaṁ yathā – dhāvatā hatthimhā patito aṅkusadhārī.
anya-e0805n2:216: Bhayahetumhi – corā bhayaṁ jāyati, taṇhāya jāyatī bhayaṁ, pāpato uttasati, akkhātari – upajjhāyā sikkhaṁ gaṇhāti, ācariyamhā adhīte, ācariyato suṇāti.
anya-e0805n2:219: Dhātavo ca nāmāni ca dhātunāmāni, tesaṁ avihitalakkhaṇānaṁ dhātunāmānaṁ payoge, upasaggayoge ca ādisaddena nipātayoge ca taṁyuttaṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:220_0: Dhātuppayoge tāva – parājiyoge yo asayho, pabhūyoge pabhavo, janiyoge jāyamānassa
anya-e0805n2:220_1: pakati ca. Yathā – buddhasmā parājenti aññatitthiyā. Himavatā pabhavanti pañca mahānadiyo,
anya-e0805n2:220_2: anavatattamhā mahāsarā pabhavanti, aciravatiyā pabhavanti kunnadiyo. Kāmato jāyatī
anya-e0805n2:220_3: soko, yasmā so jāyate gini, urasmā jāto putto, kammato jātaṁ indriyaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:221: Nāmappayoge aññatthitarādīhi yutte – nāññatra dukkhā sambhoti, nāññaṁ dukkhā nirujjhati, tato aññena kammena, tato itaraṁ, ubhato sujāto putto iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:222_0: Upasaggayuttesuapaparīhi vajjanatthehi yoge, mariyādābhividhiatthe āyoge patinā patinidhipatidānatthena
anya-e0805n2:222_1: yoge ca. Yathā – apasālāya āyanti vāṇijā, sālaṁ vajjetvāti attho. Tathā paripabbatā
anya-e0805n2:222_2: devo vassati, pabbataṁ vajjetvāti attho. Mariyādāyaṁ – āpabbatā khettaṁ. Abhividhimhi
anya-e0805n2:222_3: – ābrahmalokā saddo abbhuggacchati, brahmalokaṁ abhibyāpetvāti attho. Patinidhimhi
anya-e0805n2:222_4: – buddhasmā pati sāriputto dhammadesanāya ālapati temāsaṁ. Patidāne – ghatamassa
anya-e0805n2:222_5: telasmā pati dadāti, kanakamassa hiraññasmā pati dadāti.
anya-e0805n2:223_0: Nipātayuttesu rite nānā vinādīhi yoge – rite saddhammā kuto sukhaṁ labhati. Te bhikkhū
anya-e0805n2:223_1: nānākulā pabbajitā. Vinā saddhammā natthañño koci nātho loke vijjati. Ariyehi puthagevāyaṁ
anya-e0805n2:224_0: Apiggahaṇena kammāpādānakārakamajjhepi pañcamī kāladdhānehi, pakkhasmā vijjhati migaṁ
anya-e0805n2:224_1: luddako, ito pakkhasmā migaṁ vijjhatīti vuttaṁ hoti. Evaṁ māsasmā bhuñjati bhojanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:225_0: Casaddaggahaṇena pabhutyādiatthe, tadatthappayoge ca – yatohaṁ bhagini ariyāya jātiyā
anya-e0805n2:225_1: jāto, yato sarāmi attānaṁ, yato pattosmi viññutaṁ, yatvādhikaraṇamenaṁ, yato pabhuti,
anya-e0805n2:227_0: Rakkhaṇatthānaṁ dhātūnaṁ payoge yaṁ icchitaṁ, taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti, cakārādhikārato
anya-e0805n2:227_1: anicchitañca. Rakkhaṇañcettha nivāraṇaṁ, tāyanañca. Kāke rakkhanti taṇḍulā, yavā paṭisedhenti gāvo.
anya-e0805n2:228: Anicchitaṁ yathā – pāpā cittaṁ nivāraye, pāpānivārenti, rājato vā corato vā aggito vā udakato vā nānābhayato vā nānārogato vā nānāupaddavato vā ārakkhaṁ gaṇhantu.
anya-e0805n2:231: Yena adassanamicchitaṁ antaradhāyantena, taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti vā, antaradhānevāyaṁ. Upajjhāyā antaradhāyati sisso, nilīyatīti attho. Mātāpitūhi antaradhāyati putto.
anya-e0805n2:232: Vāti kiṁ? Jetavane antarahito. Yenāti kiṁ? Yakkho tattheva antaradhāyati.
anya-e0805n2:233: 312.Dūrantikaddhakālanimmānatvālopadisāyogavibhattārappayoga suddhappamocana hetu vivittappamāṇa pubbayoga bandhana guṇavacana pañha kathanathokākattūsu ca.
anya-e0805n2:234_0: Dūratthe, antikatthe, addhanimmāne, kālanimmāne, tvālope, disāyoge, vibhatte, āratippayoge,
anya-e0805n2:234_2: pubbayoge, bandhanatthappayoge, guṇavacane , pañhe, kathane, thokatthe, akattari
anya-e0805n2:234_3: ca yadavadhibhūtaṁ, hetukammādibhūtañca, taṁ kārakaṁ apādānasaññaṁ hoti, casaddena
anya-e0805n2:235: Ettha ca dūrantikañca dūrantikatthañcāti dūrantikanti sarūpekasesaṁ katvā vuttanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tena dūrantikatthappayoge, tadatthe ca apādānasañño hoti.
anya-e0805n2:236_0: Dūratthappayoge tāva – kīvadūro ito naḷakāragāmo, tato have dūrataraṁ vadanti, gāmato
anya-e0805n2:236_1: nātidūre. Ārakā te moghapurisā imasmā dhammavinayā, ārakā tehi bhagavā. Dūratthe
anya-e0805n2:237: Antikatthappayoge – antikaṁ gāmā, āsannaṁ gāmā, samīpaṁ gāmā, gāmassa samīpanti attho.
anya-e0805n2:238_0: Dutiyā, tatiyā ca, dūraṁ gāmaṁ āgato, dūrena gāmena āgato, dūrato gāmā āgatoti attho.
anya-e0805n2:238_1: Dūraṁ gāmena vā. Antikaṁ gāmaṁ āgato, antikaṁ gāmena vā, āsannaṁ gāmaṁ, āsannaṁ gāmena vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:239: Addhakālanimmāne nimmānaṁ nāma parimāṇaṁ, tasmiṁ gamyamāne – ito mathurāya catūsu yojanesu saṅkassaṁ, rājagahato pañcacattālīsayojanamatthake sāvatthi.
anya-e0805n2:240: Kālanimmāne – ito ekanavutikappamatthake vipassī bhagavā loke udapādi, ito vassasahassaccayena buddho loke uppajjissati.
anya-e0805n2:241_0: Tvāpaccayantassa lopo nāma tadatthasambhavepi avijjamānatā, tasmiṁ tvālope kammādhikaraṇesu
anya-e0805n2:241_1: – pāsādā saṅkameyya, pāsādaṁ abhiruhitvā saṅkameyyāti attho . Tathā hatthikkhandhā
anya-e0805n2:241_2: saṅkameyya, abhidhammā pucchanti, abhidhammaṁ sutvā vā, abhidhammā kathayanti, abhidhammaṁ
anya-e0805n2:241_3: paṭhitvā vā, āsanā vuṭṭhaheyya, āsane nisīditvā vā.
anya-e0805n2:242_0: Disatthavācīhi yoge, disatthe ca – ito sā purimā disā, ito sā dakkhiṇā disā, ito
anya-e0805n2:242_1: sā pacchimā disā, ito sā uttarā disā, avīcito uparibhavaggā, uddhaṁ pādatalā, adho
anya-e0805n2:242_2: kesamatthakā iccādi. Disatthe – puratthimato dakkhiṇatotiādi. Ettha pana sattamiyatthe
anya-e0805n2:243_0: Vibhattaṁ nāma sayaṁ vibhattasseva tadaññato guṇena vibhajanaṁ, tasmiṁ vibhatte –
anya-e0805n2:243_1: yato paṇītataro vā visiṭṭhataro vā natthi, attadanto tato varaṁ. Kiñcāpi dānato sīlameva
anya-e0805n2:243_2: varaṁ, tato mayā sutā assutameva bahutaraṁ, sīlameva sutā seyyo. Chaṭṭhī ca, channavutīnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:244: Āratippayogo nāma viramaṇatthasaddappayogo. Tattha – asaddhammā ārati, virati pāpā, pāṇātipātā veramaṇī, adinnādānā paṭivirato, appaṭivirato musāvādā.
anya-e0805n2:245: Suddhatthappayoge – lobhanīyehi dhammehi suddho asaṁsaṭṭho, mātito ca pitito ca suddho anupakkuṭṭho agarahito.
anya-e0805n2:246: Pamocanatthappayoge– parimutto dukkhasmāti vadāmi, mutto mārabandhanā, na te muccanti maccunā, muttohaṁ sabbapāsehi.
anya-e0805n2:247_0: Hetvatthe, sarūpekasesassa gahitattā hetvatthappayoge ca sabbanāmato – kasmā nu tumhaṁ
anya-e0805n2:247_1: daharā na mīyare, kasmā idheva maraṇaṁ bhavissati, kasmā hetunā, yasmā ca kammāni
anya-e0805n2:247_2: karonti, yasmā tiha bhikkhave, tasmā tiha bhikkhave evaṁ sikkhitabbaṁ, tasmā buddhosmi
anya-e0805n2:247_3: brāhmaṇa, yasmā kāraṇā, tasmā kāraṇā, kiṁ kāraṇā. Dutiyā, chaṭṭhī ca, kiṁ kāraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:247_4: taṁ kissa hetu, kissa tumhe kilamatha.
anya-e0805n2:248: Kena hetunā, kena kāraṇena, yena midhekacce sattā, tena nimittena, tena vuttamiccādīsu ‘‘hetvatthe cā’’ti tatiyā.
anya-e0805n2:249: Vivittaṁ nāma vivecanaṁ, tadatthappayoge – vivitto pāpakā dhammā, vivicceva kāmehi, vivicca akusalehi dhammehi.
anya-e0805n2:250: Pamāṇatthe tatiyā ca, āyāmato ca vitthārato ca yojanaṁ, gambhīrato ca puthulato ca yojanaṁ candabhāgāya parimāṇaṁ, parikkhepato navayojanasataparimāṇo majjhimapadeso.
anya-e0805n2:251: Dīghaso nava vidatthiyo sugatavidatthiyā pamāṇikā kāretabbā.
anya-e0805n2:252: Ettha ca ‘‘smāhismiṁna’’miccādito ‘‘smā’’ti ca ‘‘so, vā’’ti ca vattamāne
anya-e0805n2:254: Dīgha oraicceteti smāvacanassa soādeso hoti vā.
anya-e0805n2:255: Dīghaso, dīghamhā vā, [oraso, oramhā vā] tatiyā ca, yojanaṁ āyāmena, yojanaṁ vitthārena, yojanaṁ ubbedhena sāsaparāsi.
anya-e0805n2:256_0: Paṭhamatthavācakena pubbasaddena yogo pubbayogo, ettha ca pubbaggahaṇaṁ adisatthavuttino
anya-e0805n2:256_1: pubbādiggahaṇassupalakkhaṇanti daṭṭhabbaṁ, tena parādiyogepi. Yathā – pubbeva me
anya-e0805n2:256_2: bhikkhave sambodhā, ito pubbenāhosi, tato paraṁ paccantimā janapadā, dhātuliṅgehi
anya-e0805n2:256_3: parā paccayā, tato aparena samayena, tato uttarimpi iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:257: Bandhanatthappayoge bandhanahetumhi iṇe pañcamī, tatiyā ca hoti, satasmā baddho naro raññā, satena vā baddho naro.
anya-e0805n2:258_0: Phalasādhanahetubhūtassa guṇassa vacanaṁ guṇavacanaṁ, tasmiṁ guṇavacane pañcamī,
anya-e0805n2:258_1: tatiyā ca, issariyā janaṁ rakkhati rājā, issariyena vā, sīlato naṁ pasaṁsanti, sīlena
anya-e0805n2:259: Pañhakathanesu – kutosi tvaṁ, kuto bhavaṁ, pāṭaliputtato. Ettha ca kathanaṁ nāma vissajjanaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:260: Thokatthe asatvavacane karaṇe tatiyā ca, thokā muccati, thokena muccati vā, appamattakā muccati, appamattakena vā, kicchā muccati, kicchena vā.
anya-e0805n2:261_0: Akattariakārake ñāpakahetumhi – kammassa katattā upacitattā ussannattā vipulattā
anya-e0805n2:261_1: uppannaṁ hoti cakkhuviññāṇa, na tāvidaṁ nāmarūpaṁ ahetukaṁ sabbattha sabbadā sabbesañca
anya-e0805n2:266_0: Karoti attano phalanti kāraṇaṁ, kārakahetu [janakahetu], tasmiṁ kāraṇatthe ca pañcamīvibhatti
anya-e0805n2:266_1: hoti, vikappenāyaṁ, hetvatthe tatiyāya ca vihitattā, ananubodhā appaṭivedhā catunnaṁ
anya-e0805n2:266_2: ariyasaccānaṁ yathābhūtaṁ adassanā evamidaṁ dīghamaddhānaṁ sandhāvitaṁ saṁsaritaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:266_3: avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇaṁ, avijjāya tveva asesavirāganirodhā
anya-e0805n2:271: Pariggayhatīti pariggaho, yo yassa pariggaho āyatto sambandhī, taṁ pati so attho sāmisañño hoti. Vāggahaṇena sāmitabba rujādiyogepi.
anya-e0805n2:272_0: Ettha ca kriyābhisambandhābhāvā na kārakatā sambhavati. Sāmibhāvo hi kriyākārakabhāvassa
anya-e0805n2:272_1: phalabhāvena gahito, tathā hi ‘‘rañño puriso’’ti vutte yasmā rājā dadāti, puriso
anya-e0805n2:272_2: ca patiggaṇhāti, tasmā ‘‘rājapuriso’’ti viññāyati. Evaṁ yo yassa āyatto sevakādibhāvena
anya-e0805n2:272_3: vā bhaṇḍabhāvena vā samīpa samūhāvayavavikāra kāriyaavatthā jāti guṇa kriyādivasena
anya-e0805n2:272_4: vā, tassa sabbassāpi so sambandhādhārabhūto visesanaṭṭhānī āgamīvasena tividhopi
anya-e0805n2:282_0: Visesanato tāva – rañño purisoti, ettha ca rājā purisaṁ aññasāmito viseseti nivattetīti
anya-e0805n2:282_1: visesanaṁ, puriso tena visesīyatīti visesitabbo, evaṁ sabbattha visesitabbayoge visesanatova chaṭṭhī.
anya-e0805n2:283: Bhaṇḍena sambandhe – pahūtaṁ me dhanaṁ sakka, etassa paṭivīso, bhikkhussa pattacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0805n2:286: Avayavasambandhe – manussasseva te sīsaṁ, rukkhassa sākhā.
anya-e0805n2:288: Kāriyasambandhe – yavassa aṅkuro, meghassa saddo, puttāpi tassa bahavo, kammānaṁ phalaṁ vipāko.
anya-e0805n2:289: Avatthāsambandhe – khandhānaṁ pātubhāvo, khandhānaṁ jarā, khandhānaṁ bhedo.
anya-e0805n2:291_0: Guṇasambandhe – suvaṇṇassa vaṇṇo, vaṇṇo na khīyetha tathāgatassa, buddhassa guṇaghoso,
anya-e0805n2:291_1: pupphānaṁ gandho, phalānaṁ raso, cittassa phusanā, sippikānaṁ sataṁ natthi, tilānaṁ
anya-e0805n2:291_2: muṭṭhi, tesaṁ samāyogo, sandhino vimokkho, tathāgatassa paññāpāramiṁ ārabbha, pubbacariyaṁ
anya-e0805n2:291_3: vā, sukhaṁ te, dukkhaṁ te, cetaso parivitakko udapādi, paññāya paṭubhāvo, rūpassa
anya-e0805n2:292_0: Kriyāsambandhe – pādassa ukkhipanaṁ, pādassa avakkhepanaṁ vā, hatthassa samiñjanaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:292_1: pādānaṁ pasāraṇaṁ, dhātūnaṁ gamanaṁ, dhātūnaṁyeva ṭhānaṁ, nisajjā, sayanaṁ vā. Tathā
anya-e0805n2:292_2: tassa nāmagottādi, tassa kāraṇaṁ, tassa mātāpitaro, tassa purato pāturahosi, tassa
anya-e0805n2:292_3: pacchato, nagarassa dakkhiṇato, vassānaṁ tatiye māse, na tassa upamā, kuverassa bali iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:296: Tabba rujādiyoge – mahāsenāpatīnaṁ ujjhāpetabbaṁ vikanditabbaṁ viravitabbaṁ, devadattassa rujati, tassa rogo uppajjati, rajakassa vatthaṁ dadāti, musāvādassa ottappaṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:300: Yajassa karaṇe – pupphassa buddhaṁ yajati, pupphena vā, ghatassa aggiṁ juhoti.
anya-e0805n2:301: Suhitatthayoge – pattaṁ odanassa pūretvā, odanenāti attho. Imameva kāyaṁ pūraṁ nānappakārassa asucino paccavekkhati, pūraṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇassa, pūrati bālo pāpassa.
anya-e0805n2:302: Tulyatthakimalamādiyoge – pitussa tulyo, pitarā vā tulyo, mātu sadiso, mātarā sadiso vā, kiṁ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa, kiṁ tena tuṭṭhenāti attho. Alaṁ tassa ca tuṭṭhassa.
anya-e0805n2:303_0: Kattari kitappaccayayoge – sobhanā kaccāyanassa kati, kaccāyanena vā, rañño sammato,
anya-e0805n2:303_1: raññā vā, evaṁ rañño pūjito, rañño sakkato, rañño apacito, rañño mānito, amataṁ tesaṁ
anya-e0805n2:303_2: bhikkhave aparibhuttaṁ, yesaṁ kāyagatāsati aparibhuttā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:304_0: Sattamiyatthe kusalādiyoge – kusalā naccagītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiyo, kusalo tvaṁ
anya-e0805n2:304_1: rathassa aṅgapaccaṅgānaṁ, kusalo maggassa, kusalo amaggassa, santi hi bhante uḷārā
anya-e0805n2:304_2: yakkhā bhagavato pasannā, divasassa tikkhattuṁ, divase tikkhattuṁ vā, māsassa dvikkhattuṁ iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:308_0: Dutiyatthe kammani kitakayoge – tassa bhavanti vattāro, sahasā kammassa kattāro,
anya-e0805n2:308_1: amatassa dātā, bhinnānaṁ sandhātā, sahitānaṁ anuppadātā, bodhetā pajāya, kammassa
anya-e0805n2:308_2: kārako natthi, vipākassa ca vedako, avisaṁvādako lokassa, pāpānaṁ akaraṇaṁ sukhaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:308_3: catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ upādāya pasādo, acchariyo arajakena vatthānaṁ rāgo, acchariyo
anya-e0805n2:309: Tathā saricchādīnaṁ kammani – mātu sarati, mātaraṁ sarati, na tesaṁ koci sarati, sattānaṁ kammappaccayā, puttassa icchati, puttamicchati.
anya-e0805n2:310: Karotissapatiyatane ca – patiyatanaṁ abhisaṅkhāro, udakassa patikurute, udakaṁ patikurute, kaṇḍassa patikurute, kaṇḍaṁ patikurute.
anya-e0805n2:311_0: Pañcamiyatthe parihānibhayatthayoge – assavanatā dhammassa parihāyanti, kiṁ nu kho
anya-e0805n2:311_1: ahaṁ tassa sukhassa bhāyāmi, sabbe tasanti daṇḍassa, sabbe bhāyanti maccuno, bhīto
anya-e0805n2:312: Kvacīti kiṁ? Gambhīrañca kathaṁ kattā, kālena dhammiṁ kathaṁ bhāsitā hoti, paresaṁ puññāni anumoditā, bujjhitā saccāni, kaṭaṁ kārako, pasavo ghātako.
anya-e0805n2:313: Tathā na niṭṭhādīsu ca – sukhakāmī vihāraṁ kato, rathaṁ katavanto, rathaṁ katāvī, kaṭaṁ katvā, kaṭaṁ karonto, kaṭaṁ karāno, kaṭaṁ kurumāno iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:319: Ādhārīyati asminti ādhāro, adhikaraṇaṁ. Kattukammasamavetānaṁ nisajjapacanādikriyānaṁ patiṭṭhānaṭṭhena yo ādhāro, taṁ kārakaṁ okāsasaññaṁ hoti.
anya-e0805n2:320: Kaṭe nisīdati devadatto, thāliyaṁ odanaṁ pacati. Ettha hi devadattataṇḍulānaṁ kattukammānaṁ dhāraṇato taṁsamavetaṁ āsanapacanasaṅkhātaṁ kriyaṁ dhāreti nāma.
anya-e0805n2:321: So panāyamokāso catubbidho byāpiko opasilesiko sāmīpiko vesayikoti.
anya-e0805n2:322_0: Tattha byāpiko nāma yattha sakalopi ādhārabhūto attho ādheyyena patthaṭo hoti, yasmiñca
anya-e0805n2:322_1: ādheyyabhūtaṁ kiñci byāpetvā tiṭṭhati, taṁ yathā – tilesu telaṁ atthi, khīlesu jalaṁ, dadhimhi sappīti.
anya-e0805n2:323_0: Opasilesiko nāma paccekasiddhānaṁ bhāvānaṁ yattha upasilesena upagamo hoti, yasmiñca
anya-e0805n2:323_1: ādheyyo upasilissati allīyitvā tiṭṭhati, taṁ yathā – āsane nisinno saṅgho, thāliyaṁ
anya-e0805n2:323_2: odanaṁ pacati, ghaṭesu udakaṁ atthi, dūre ṭhito, samīpe ṭhitoti.
anya-e0805n2:324_0: Sāmīpiko nāma yattha samīpe samīpivohāraṁ katvā tadāyattavuttitādīpanatthaṁ ādhārabhāvo
anya-e0805n2:324_1: vikappīyati, taṁ yathā – gaṅgāyaṁ ghoso vasati, gaṅgāya samīpe vajo vasatīti attho.
anya-e0805n2:324_2: Bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane, sāvatthiyā samīpeti attho.
anya-e0805n2:325_0: Vesayiko nāma yattha aññatthābhāvavasena, desantarāvacchedavasena vā ādhārabhāvo
anya-e0805n2:325_1: parikappo, taṁ yathā – ākāse sakuṇā pakkhanti, bhūmīsu manussā caranti, jalesu macchā,
anya-e0805n2:325_2: pādesu patito, pāpasmiṁ ramatī mano, pasanno buddhasāsane, paññāya sādhu, vinaye
anya-e0805n2:325_3: nipuṇo, mātari sādhu, pitari nipuṇo iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:326: Sabbopi cāyamādhāro padhānavasena vā parikappitavasena vā kriyāya patiṭṭhā bhavatīti okāsotveva vuttoti veditabbo.
anya-e0805n2:338: Sāmī issara adhipati dāyāda sakkhipatibhū pasūta kusalaiccetehi yoge chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Ubhayatthaṁ vacanaṁ.
anya-e0805n2:339_0: Gavaṁ sāmi, gosu sāmi, gavaṁ issaro, gosu issaro, gavaṁ adhipati, gosu adhipati,
anya-e0805n2:339_1: gavaṁ dāyādo, gosu dāyādo, gavaṁ sakkhi, gosu sakkhi, gavaṁ patibhū, gosu patibhū,
anya-e0805n2:339_2: gavaṁ pasūto, gosu pasūto, gavaṁ kusalo, gosu kusalo.
anya-e0805n2:341_0: Nīharitvā dhāraṇaṁ niddhāraṇaṁ, jāti guṇa kriyā nāmehi samudāyato ekadesassa puthakkaraṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:341_1: tasmiṁ niddhāraṇatthe gamyamāne tato samudāyavāciliṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n2:342_0: Manussānaṁ khattiyo sūratamo, manussesu khattiyo sūratamo, kaṇhā gāvīnaṁ sampannakhīratamā,
anya-e0805n2:342_1: kaṇhā gāvīsu sampannakhīratamā, addhikānaṁ dhāvanto sīghatamo, addhikesu dhāvanto
anya-e0805n2:342_2: sīghatamo, āyasmā ānando arahataṁ aññataro ahosi, arahantesu vā iccādi.
anya-e0805n2:344: Anādare gamyamāne bhāvavatā liṅgamhā chaṭṭhīvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca. Akāmakānaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ rudantānaṁ pabbaji, mātāpitūsu rudantesu pabbaji.
anya-e0805n2:351: Kammatthe – bhikkhūsu abhivādenti, muddhani cumbitvā, purisassa bāhāsu gahetvā.
anya-e0805n2:352: Karaṇatthe – hatthesu piṇḍāya caranti, pattesu piṇḍāya caranti, pathesu gacchanti, sopi maṁ anusāseyya, sampaṭicchāmi matthake.
anya-e0805n2:353: Nimittatthe– dīpi cammesu haññate, kuñjaro dantesu haññate, aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṁ, musāvādanimittaṁ musāvādappaccayāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:356: Sampadānatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Saṅghe dinnaṁ mahapphalaṁ, saṅghe gotami dehi, saṅghe te dinne ahañceva pūjito bhavissāmi.
anya-e0805n2:357: Yā palālamayaṁ mālaṁ, nārī datvāna cetiye;
anya-e0805n2:360: Pañcamyatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti. Kadalīsu gaje rakkhanti.
anya-e0805n2:362_0: Kālo nāma nimesa khaṇa laya muhutta pubbaṇhādiko, bhāvo nāma kriyā, sā cettha kriyantarūpalakkhaṇāva
anya-e0805n2:362_1: adhippetā, tasmiṁ kālatthe ca bhāvalakkhaṇe bhāvatthe ca liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:363: Kāle – pubbaṇhasamaye gato, sāyanhasamaye āgato, akāle vassati tassa, kāle tassa na vassati, phussamāsamhā tīsu māsesu vesākhamāso, ito satasahassamhi, kappe uppajji cakkhumā.
anya-e0805n2:364_0: Bhāvenabhāvalakkhaṇe– bhikkhusaṅghesu bhojīyamānesu gato, bhuttesu āgato, gosu duyhamānāsu
anya-e0805n2:364_1: gato, duddhāsu āgato, jāyamāne kho sāriputta bodhisatte ayaṁ dasasahassilokadhātu
anya-e0805n2:369: Dvipadamidaṁ. Adhikatthe, issaratthe ca vattamānehi upaadhiiccetehi yoge adhikissaravacane gamyamāne liṅgamhā sattamīvibhatti hoti.
anya-e0805n2:370_0: Adhikavacane – upa khāriyaṁ doṇo, khāriyā doṇo adhikoti attho. Tathā upa nikkhe kahāpaṇaṁ,
anya-e0805n2:370_1: adhi devesu buddho, sammutiupapattivisuddhidevasaṅkhātehi tividhehipi devehi sabbaññū
anya-e0805n2:371: Issaravacane – adhi brahmadatte pañcālā, brahmadattissarā pañcālāti attho.
anya-e0805n2:373_0: Maṇḍitaussukkaiccetesvatthesu gamyamānesu liṅgamhā tatiyāvibhatti hoti, sattamī ca.
anya-e0805n2:373_1: Maṇḍitasaddo panettha pasannatthavācako, ussukkasaddo saīhattho. Ñāṇena pasanno,
anya-e0805n2:373_2: ñāṇasmiṁ pasanno, ñāṇena ussukko, ñāṇasmiṁ ussukko sappuriso.
anya-e0805n2:375: Pabhedā sattadhā kammaṁ, kattā pañcavidho bhave.
anya-e0805n2:376: Karaṇaṁ duvidhaṁ hoti, sampadānaṁ tidhā mataṁ;
anya-e0805n2:378: Vibhattiyo pana paccattavacanādivasena aṭṭhavidhā bhavanti. Yathāha
